tswitem.name: Advanced Kickback - Evade
tswitem.tooltip:
Advanced Kickback - Evade
Gadget (QL 10 Epic)
Character Bound
Kickback: For 20 seconds, whenever you evade an attack you gain
1: 695 Hit Rating
2: 695 Block Rating
3: 785 Critical Rating
4: 695 Critical Power Rating
5: 695 Defence Rating
6: 720 Evade Rating
7: 450 Physical and Magical Protection
8: 695 Penetration Rating
for 4 seconds. Applies a 2 minute cooldown to all Kickbacks.
